description: Harissa spiced chicken is a fiery filling for these homemade pides, delicious dipped in garlic yoghurt.
keywords: Flatbread,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Egg,Lemon,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Pide with Garlic Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cloves garlic, peeled and minced, divided

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the flour, sugar, yeast and salt into a large bowl and stir to combine. Add 80ml of warm water and 2 tablespoons of oil and mix to combine. Tip on to a lightly floured work surface and knead for 5 minutes until smooth and springy.
Place in an oiled bowl and cover with a damp towel. Set aside to rise in a warm place for 1 hour. Mix yoghurt, lemon juice and zest and 1 garlic clove together in a small bowl.

Add the remaining oil to a large pan on medium heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Add the chicken mince and cook for 34 minutes to brown, stir in 2 cloves of garlic and harissa and cook for 2 minutes.
Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Tip the dough on to a floured work surface and cut into 4 pieces. Roll each piece into an oval shape.

Place the dough ovals on a lined baking tray and spoon the beef mix onto each, sprinkling a layer of crumbled feta on top. Leave a border around the edges and roll up to form a crust. Brush the edges with beaten egg and bake for 1015 minutes until golden and crisp.
